slides.heading: Love Photography?
slides.text: We are a group of students of the University of Edinburgh, passionate to explore the world of photography. Join us for frequent events and trips!

slides.heading: Explore the Highlands.
slides.text: Discover beautiful scenes of the Scottish Highlands, from one of our recent trips to the Isle of Skye!

slides.heading: See the World with Different Eyes!
slides.text: No matter whether you are a novice or an expert, our society is open to all new members. Join us to one of our regular meet-ups!

features.heading: Lake District.
features.text: Photosoc had its semesterly overnight trip 2017 to the breathtaking landscape of Lake District, the birthplace of poet Wordsworth and many inspiring photography spots. Possibly the most photographed place in the UK, this time we explored the iconic tree ‘sentinels’ of Lake Buttermere and had a chance of star gazing photography.

features.heading: Haribo bears!
features.heading_muted: Macro shots and more from this photoshoot.
features.text: A macro shot from last year's macro photography workshop by an unknown photosocer in James Killick's group.
